      • Task

        public Task​(java.lang.String title,
            int time)
        Constructor to create an object a one-time task

        title - is a string containing task title
        time - is a number defining the task's starting moment

      • Task

        public Task​(java.lang.String title,
            int start,
            int end,
            int repeat)
        Constructor for creating an object recurring task
        Parameters:
        title - is a string containing task title
        start - is a number defining the starting moment of the alerting about task
        end - is a number defining the ending moment of the alerting about task
        repeat - is a number defining the time interval for repeating the alert about the task
